item.title: CM Siddaramaiah to Launch ₹936 Crore Projects in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah will inaugurate and lay the foundation stone for multiple development projects worth ₹936 crore on Monday in the Raichur Rural Assembly constituency. He will also attend a tribal cultural festival and other landmark events in the region.
Among the key programs, the CM will launch the naming ceremony of Adikavi Shri Maharshi Valmiki University, lay the foundation stone for the Valmiki Park and bronze statue, and inaugurate the Kalyana Karnataka Human Genome S...]]>
item.author: The Hindustan Gazette
